posts.title: Looking for Team Members for Hackathon
posts.description: Join our team for the upcoming campus hackathon. We need a frontend developer and a data scientist.

posts.title: Flatmates Wanted: 2 Rooms Available
posts.description: We have 2 rooms available in a 4-bedroom apartment near campus. Looking for quiet and clean students.

posts.title: UROP in Computational Biology
posts.description: Seeking an undergraduate research partner in a project on gene sequencing. Preferably someone with a bioinformatics background.

posts.title: Group Study for Linear Algebra Finals
posts.description: Starting a study group for the upcoming Linear Algebra finals. Planning to meet in the library twice a week.

posts.title: Exploring Quantum Computing Basics
posts.description: Anyone interested in forming a discussion group around quantum computing? Beginners welcome!

posts.title: Sustainable Campus Initiative Meetup
posts.description: Let's brainstorm ways to make our campus more sustainable. Open to all students passionate about the environment.

comments.body: I'm interested in the hackathon team! I have experience in frontend development.
Is one of the rooms still available? I'd like more details.
I'm a bioinformatics major and would love to discuss the UROP opportunity.
Great idea! I'm struggling with Linear Algebra and would benefit from a study group.
Quantum computing is fascinating! I'm a complete beginner but would love to learn more.
I've been researching campus sustainability projects. Would be keen to share and learn from others.
